title: Wall Street Breakfast, May 10th: BoE Monetary Decision; California To Require Solar Panels
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Our top stories today: The Bank of England will release its monetary policy decision and other data; California will require solar panels on all homes; and Comcast will include a $2.5 billion dollar breakup fee for 21st Century Fox entertainment assets.
